videos.description: Oregon's Tyler Dorsey gets the lucky bounce on his 3-pointerand gets the scoring started for the Ducks.
videos.headline: Oregon gets going with 3-pointer

videos.description: Oregon's Chris Boucher hammers down a monster two-handed jam.
videos.headline: Boucher slams down angry dunk

videos.description: Oregon's Jordan Bell goes underneath the rim and finishes with the one-handed dunk to help pad the lead for the Ducks.
videos.headline: Bell goes under the rim for the dunk

videos.description: Oregon's Jordan Bell gets the steal and goes down court for the contested layup.
videos.headline: Bell takes it himself for the layup

videos.description: Oregon's Jodan Bell chases down Utah's Lorenzo Bonam to swat away his layup.
videos.headline: Bell stops an easy layup with block

videos.description: Oregon's Dillion Brooks leaps in the air and dunks all over Utah's David Collette for the emphatic jam.
videos.headline: Brooks posterizes Utah defender in Oregon's win

videos.description: Oregon's Dillon Brooks reacts strongly to seeing his powerful dunk in Thursday's win against Utah for the first time and gives his take on the new jerseys the Ducks wore in the game.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Brooks says 'oh my goodness' when looking at his own dunk) 2017/02/16 ESHEET SC

videos.headline: Brooks says 'oh my goodness' when looking at his own dunk
